item.title: RITE AID CORP 10-K
item.description: RITE AID CORP, which is in the Retail-Drug Stores And Proprietary Stores [5912] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 25, 2022 had 51342 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: february - 600 instances company - 567 instances 2022 - 450 instances pharmacy - 429 instances 2021 - 392 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
